about_the_game:
It's been two years since the events of Solenars Edge Rebirth. A new mysterious threat known as the Archieves emerge with a simple yet catastrophic goal; wipe out all existence. Play as Yenta and other chosen to discover the mystery behind the Archieves as well as the whereabouts of the remaining chosen all while trying to prevent the end of existence itself.

Play through the events that in Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn refers to as the "Archieves Massacre." Find out what happened Three years before the events of Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn.

*It is highly suggested that you do not play this DLC unless you have beaten Solenars Edge Rebirth. It will contain many spoilers that may ruin the story for you and/or make you confused.*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Two years after the events of Solenars Edge Rebirth. An old enemy returns from hiding and wreaks havoc among Alcornagia.
